price: 11. Markay biyihii xad dhaafeen waxaan idinku qaadnay (dadow) Doonidii (uu sameeyey Nuux).
arabic: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā lammā ṭaghā al-māu ḥamalnākum fī al-jāriyati
